name: BP Premiums for BuddyPress
author: SuitePlugins

sections.description:
BP Premiums is the additional edge needed to monetize a BuddyPress Social Network. Additional to Memberships, you can charge site members a premium for access to parts and features of your social network. Using WooCommerce, administrators can create individual or bundles of products of features. Restrict access to certain BuddyPress features on your site.

Take your social network to the next level, check out the addons available to enhance your site

Built-in Addons

Group Create Access – Limit group creation and force users to pay for a quota of groups they can create.

  • Users can purchase packages to create groups

  • After each purchase, users receive a quota of groups they can create.

Premium Group Access – Require users to pay to join private groups

  • Administrators select a number of private groups that users can pay to join

  • Upon completing an order, members are automatically added to private groups

rtMedia (BuddyPress Media) – Require users to purchase access to upload and/or browse media files by RTMedia

  • Site members can be restricted from uploading any media files unless access is purchased

  • Site members are restricted from browsing another user’s media files unless access is purchased

  • Requires rtMedia

  • Available Here rtMedia Addon

BuddyDrive – Force users to purchase access to upload and/or browse files by the BuddyDrive Plugin

  • Site members can be restricted from uploading any buddydrive files unless access is purchased

  • Site members are restricted from browsing another user’s buddydrive files unless access is purchased

  • Site members can pay to increase their BuddyDrive quota

  • Requires BuddyDrive

  • Available Here BuddyDrive Addon

Member Types (Coming Soon)

BP Gifts (Coming Soon)

Possible Social Network User Cases

  • Dating Sites
  • Community Networks
  • Entertainment
  • Family
  • Fan Sites
  • Education/Tutor Sites

Developer Notes

  • Translation Ready
  • Documented
  • Hooks and Filters available
  • Documentation available

Requirements

BuddyPress and WooCommerce are both required to use the plugin.

Languages

English (United States)
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘BP Premiums’
  3. Activate BP Premiums from your Plugins page.

From WordPress.org

  1. Download BP Premiums.
  2. Upload the ‘sp-bp-premiums’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate BP Premiums from your Plugins page.
sections.faq:
What is required to accept payments?

The plugin uses WooCommerce to creates products and bundles of features as well process payment.

What happens after a user makes a purchase?

Once the order is completed, the user’s account will be updated according to purchased features.

Is there any support available for this plugin?

Support is provided at SuitePlugins

Can the plugin be integrated with other third-party plugins?

Yes! Any developer can create a new addon that will work with other plugins.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

Initial Release

1.2.0

  • Revamped code structure
  • Included 3 modules that extends BP Premiums

short_description: BP Premiums is an addon for monetizing social networks. Charge users a premium for accessing features on your network.
